description.@en: Dungeoneers have spent an inordinate amount of time learning the ins and outs of traps, whether mechanical or human. As a result, they exhibit an uncanny knack for escaping deadly snares and ambushes â€“ invariably by the skin of their teeth.

effect.@en: At any time, you may spend 1 Fortune Point to avoid a trap or other contrivance intended to cause you harm, or cancel the effects of being Surprised following an ambush. Additionally, treat a result of 20% on percentile dice as a Critical Success, no matter whether you would have failed or Critically Failed the Skill Test.
